page.title: 17Transport
page.content: The{bus}fares in our area are cheap anyone over five years old pays two pence until they are sixteen.Old age pensioners have free passes to travel anywhere on the{bus}.Running through our area is part of the M1 motorway. Also there is a demolished{train}track that had not been used for many years. There are a lot of heavy lorries all over the coutry roads.They are mostly coal{lorries}and large mining equipment as well as large farming machinery.The{lorries}are using our country lanes and riding through the little villages.There were lots of police conveys about during the miners strike.The Five Lane Ends at Pickburn is very dangerous as well as the junction at Marr.All the roads in our area have to carry a lot of traffic and apart from the main Doncaster to Barnsley road aren't really suitable.
